links.title: BackBone Tutorial: Introduction to Backbone.Js
links.description: Backbone.js is a lightweight framework that lets us create single page applications in a structured manner. It is based on the Model-View-Controller (MV*) pattern. It is best suited for creating single page applications using a RESTful service for persisting data.
